mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_admin(id,user_name, password, salt ,remark,creator, position) VALUES(#{id},#{userName}, #{password}, #{salt} ,#{remark},#{creator}, #{position})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_admin SET password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, lastTime = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

select ta.*,tc.name,tb.role_id as roleId from t_admin ta left join t_admin_user_role tb on ta.id = tb.user_id left join t_admin_role tc on tc.role_id=tb.role_id order by ta.createTime desc
